name: database-structure-analyzer
description: A Node.js app to analyze database structures, generate SQL files, and create SVG visualizations

scripts.validate-config: node -e "const {ConfigManager} = require('./lib/ConfigManager'); new ConfigManager().load().then(() => console.log('✅ Configuration valid')).catch(e => {console.error('❌', e.message); process.exit(1);});"
